WorkItem.Description:
hi guys
 
I dont know if anyone else is getting this, but when i download my character from armory it tells me i have 5500 but i only got 4999, so if anyone could assist with me this plz?
 
thanx

Comments.Message: This factors in buffs, and procs (averaged out over time).

This is a case were a little hover tooltip (like is already in some models) would help by showing character sheet AP and proc AP averaged.   Some of the tooltips in other models seem to have almost too much info, but in this case a little bit would help people understand what they are seeing a bit better (and I see this question asked here every few months or so)  :)
